oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P. B. Newman amnesty oath
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Amnesty oath of P. B. Newman, Co. G, 43rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. P. B. Newman was born in Jefferson County, Tennessee, in 1843. He enlisted in October of 1862 and served through the end of the war in April 1865.; Newman married Elizabeth Wilson in McMinn County, Tennessee, on November 7, 1872. He died on March 7, 1908. Affixed to the document is a 2-cent internal revenue stamp.
